channel.title: [PI] SOLVED Clicking a chest for exp
channel.description:
I need to make it where you click a chest or another object for experience towards a skill. I'm using project insanity!!!
I did this: [code] case OBJECT_ID: return c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp, skillID); [/code] and i got a wierd error [code] cannot return a value from method whose result type is void return.cgetPA().addSkillXP(500, 16); [/code] any other way i can do this or any fix for it?

item.title: [PI] SOLVED Clicking a chest for exp
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”] case OBJECT: c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp, skillId); break;[/quote]
ty it worked

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] SOLVED Clicking a chest for exp

item.title: [PI] SOLVED Clicking a chest for exp
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:2, topic:384281”][quote author=belhelmiel link=topic=480043.msg3514249#msg3514249 date=1298830197]
I need to make it where you click a chest or another object for experience towards a skill. I’m using project insanity!!!

I did this:

case OBJECT_ID:
    return c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp, skillID);

and i got a wierd error

cannot return a value from method whose result type is void
    return.cgetPA().addSkillXP(500, 16);

any other way i can do this or any fix for it?
[/quote]
you’re doing it wrong:

switch(case)
{
    case obj:
        add_item(id);
        break;
}

idk if that’s what you wanted to do, but you cannot return a void data type – find another way.[/quote]
… dude im trying to add exp not items lol

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] SOLVED Clicking a chest for exp

item.title: [PI] SOLVED Clicking a chest for exp
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“belhelmiel, post:1, topic:384281”]I need to make it where you click a chest or another object for experience towards a skill. I’m using project insanity!!!

I did this:

case OBJECT_ID:
    return c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp, skillID);

and i got a wierd error

cannot return a value from method whose result type is void
    return.cgetPA().addSkillXP(500, 16);

any other way i can do this or any fix for it? [/quote]
you’re doing it wrong:

switch(case)
{
    case obj:
        add_item(id);
        break;
}

idk if that’s what you wanted to do, but you cannot return a void data type – find another way.

Read full topic
